Name: Norega
About the game: Helo guys! I am very proud to announce you my biggest and most polished game that took me quite some time and dedication to be made. Questions: 1 What is this game about? - This is a RPG-IDLE game hybrid. 2 This looks like your older games? - Most rpgs have same kind of content... a town where you upgrade your character and stages. 3 Is this an IDLE game again? - I believe you can play actively (until you get bored up to the final stage) and beat the Game. 4 Will this game be removed from the store? - No! 5 Is there any reason for me to play this game actively?? instead of playing it Idling?? - By playing actively you get rewards much faster then in IDLE-PLAY. 6 IDLE GAME?? - If you dont like it there is no reason to be here... ABOUT THIS GAME Norega is a RPG-IDLE Hybrid It can be played as an RPG (After 1 boss gets repetitive) it can also be played as an IDLE-GAME . The game has NO OFFLINE-PROGRESS...but RUNS ON BACKGROUND. If you are like me and loves GRINDING GAMES ... I highly recommend trying to beat the game without IDLE-MODE ! After that you can let it IDLING ... Its up to you! Norega is a game where you play as Kurt, a Knight in training, and your task is to feed up Kurt's stats so that he can improve in Strength and be able to defeat the tougher monsters found on the outskirts of Norega. You must click the GATES (Button) and the Gates can take you to 5 diffeent locations and is up to you to decide whats best for you at the moment as long as you defeated the previous stages. FEATURES Fight Enemies Alchemy Jewelry Sharpen Equipment Master Talents (HALLS) Bank Smith(Craft weapons) Thanks! =)
